QuestData.Title: Prime Planning
QuestData.Description:
The commander ordered me to establish a forward base and dispatch any resistance. It wasn't until I did all the dispatching that I realized something.
<Sharnax lets out a long sigh.>
The Primalists were talking about Tyrhold.
Unless you are exceptionally skilled at interrogation, I need you to discover their plans.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Primalist Orders from the nearby Primalists in the upper terrace of Gelikyr Overlook.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Sharnax outside of the cave in Gelikyr Overlook.
QuestData.RewardText: This is just what we needed.
